subject: Missing item
description_text:
Hello , i just received my pro x ultra pedal kit and it seems that i did
not received my haptic modules that was comming with it , can you tell me
if its coming in an other package?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi billy dancause,    Don't worry, this is another logistics link for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEKD2892934789YQ

That's great, thank you very much.
